mapper.select: SELECT DEVICE_ID FROM tb_device_info WHERE DEVICE_ID = #{deviceId} AND STATE = "1";
SELECT LOCATION, COUNT FROM tb_device_current_count WHERE DEVICE_ID = #{deviceId};
SELECT B.ITEM_CODE, B.ITEM_NAME FROM tb_tag_current_location A LEFT JOIN tb_item_info B ON A.TAG = B.TAG WHERE A.DEVICE_ID = #{deviceId} AND A.LOCATION = #{location};

SELECT A.DEVICE_ID, A.LOCATION, B.ITEM_CODE, B.ITEM_NAME, B.ITEM_GROUP, B.ITEM_STANDARD, B.ITEM_ADMIN, B.ITEM_DEPART, B.ITEM_SITE, B.ITEM_ROOM, B.ITEM_GET_DATE, B.ITEM_GET_PRICE, B.ITEM_NOTE
FROM tb_tag_current_location A LEFT JOIN tb_item_info B ON A.TAG = B.TAG
AND A.TAG = B.TAG
AND A.DEVICE_ID IN(
#{deviceIdArr}
)
AND B.ITEM_CODE like CONCAT('%',#{itemCode},'%')
AND B.ITEM_NAME like CONCAT('%',#{itemName},'%')
AND B.ITEM_GROUP like CONCAT('%',#{itemGroup},'%')
AND B.ITEM_STANDARD like CONCAT('%',#{itemStandard},'%')
AND B.ITEM_ADMIN like CONCAT('%',#{itemAdmin},'%')
AND B.ITEM_DEPART like CONCAT('%',#{itemDepart},'%')
AND B.ITEM_SITE like CONCAT('%',#{itemSite},'%')
AND B.ITEM_ROOM like CONCAT('%',#{itemRoom},'%')
AND B.ITEM_GET_DATE like CONCAT('%',#{itemGetDate},'%')
AND B.ITEM_GET_PRICE like CONCAT('%',#{itemGetPrice},'%')
AND B.ITEM_NOTE like CONCAT('%',#{itemNote},'%')
